Anchor of the expression function, taken.caption: The label of the screenshot
Anchor of the expression function, taken.img: Image file name, without extension, in expression help or algorithm img folders

expression_function_GeometryGroup_affine.caption: Vector point layer (green dots) before (left), and after (right) an affine transformation (translation).

expression_function_GeometryGroup_bounda.caption: Boundary (black dashed line) of the source polygon layer

expression_function_GeometryGroup_bounds.caption: Black lines represent the bounding boxes of each polygon feature

expression_function_GeometryGroup_buffer.caption: Buffer (in yellow) of points, line, polygon with positive buffer, and polygon with negative buffer
Buffering line features using the m value on the vertices

expression_function_GeometryGroup_centro.caption: The red stars represent the centroids of the features of the input layer.

expression_function_GeometryGroup_concav.caption: Concave hulls with increasing target_percent parameter

expression_function_GeometryGroup_convex.caption: Black lines identify the convex hull for each feature

expression_function_GeometryGroup_densif.caption: Red points show the vertices before and after the densify
Densify geometry at a given interval

expression_function_GeometryGroup_differ.caption: Difference operation between a two-features input layer ‘a’ and a single feature overlay layer ‘b’ (left) - resulting in a new layer with the modified ‘a’ features (right)

expression_function_GeometryGroup_end_po.caption: End point of a line feature

expression_function_GeometryGroup_extend.caption: The red dashes represent the initial and final extension of the original layer

expression_function_GeometryGroup_exteri.caption: The dashed line represents the exterior ring of the polygon

expression_function_GeometryGroup_extrud.caption: Generating a polygon by extruding a line with offset in x and y directions

expression_function_GeometryGroup_interi.caption: The dashed line represents a specific interior ring of the polygon

expression_function_GeometryGroup_line_i.caption: Interpolated point at 500m of the beginning of the line

expression_function_GeometryGroup_line_s.caption: Substring line with starting distance set at 0 meters and the ending distance at 250 meters.

expression_function_GeometryGroup_minima.caption: Minimal enclosing circle of each feature

expression_function_GeometryGroup_offset.caption: In blue the source layer, in red the offset one

expression_function_GeometryGroup_simpli.caption: From left to right, source layer and increasing simplification tolerances

expression_function_GeometryGroup_single.caption: Left versus right side buffer on the same vector line layer

expression_function_GeometryGroup_smooth.caption: Increasing number of iterations causes smoother geometries

expression_function_GeometryGroup_square.caption: Symbolizing features with square randomized waves

expression_function_GeometryGroup_start_.caption: Starting point of a line feature

expression_function_GeometryGroup_triang.caption: Symbolizing features with triangular randomized waves
